Attach XY coordinates to a data frame

Source: R/pipeline_base_functions.R
attach_xy.Rd

This function attaches XY coordinates to a data frame based on a spatial object containing the coordinates. It performs a left join operation to match the coordinates with the corresponding locations in the data frame.

Usage

attach_xy(data_full, data_sf, locs_id = "site_id", time_id = "time")

Arguments

data_full

The full data frame to which XY coordinates will be attached.

data_sf

The spatial object containing the XY coordinates.

locs_id

The column name in the spatial object that represents the location identifier.

time_id

The column name in the data frame that represents the time identifier.

Value

A data frame with the XY coordinates attached.

On this page
